doc:
Aasif Mandvi https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Aasif_Mandvi 0 Aasif Hakim Mandviwala (born March 5, 1966), known professionally as Aasif Mandvi (, AH-sif MAHND-vee), is a British-American actor and comedian. He began appearing as an occasional contributing correspondent on The Daily Show on August 9, 2006. On March 12, 2007, he was promoted to a regular correspondent. He is the lead actor, co-writer and producer of the web series Halal in the Family, which premiered on Funny or Die in 2015, and an actor, writer and co-producer of the HBO comedy series The Brink. Mandvi is also the author of the book No Land's Man. Aasif_Hakim_Mandviwala ( born March_5_,_1966 ) , known professionally as Aasif_Mandvi ( ,_AH-sif_MAHND-vee ) , is a_British-American_actor_and_comedian . He began_appearing as an_occasional_contributing_correspondent on The_Daily_Show on August_9_,_2006 . On March_12_,_2007 , he was_promoted to a_regular_correspondent . He is the_lead_actor , co-writer_and_producer of the_web_series_Halal in the_Family , which premiered on Funny or Die in 2015 , and an_actor_,_writer_and_co-producer of the_HBO_comedy_series The_Brink . Mandvi is also the_author of the_book No_Land 's_Man .
